content: This article **relies largely or entirely on a single source**. Relevant discussion may be found on the talk page. Please help improve this article by introducing citations to additional sources. *Find sources:* "List of Republic of Singapore Air Force squadrons" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(May 2020)* This is a **list of [Republic of Singapore Air Force](/wiki/Republic_of_Singapore_Air_Force) [squadrons](/wiki/Squadron_(aviation))**. ## Squadrons by alphabetical order -
